Mounting a USB drive at boot

05 May 2015

I have a Fat32 formatted USB drive and I want to have it mounted when the Raspberry Pi boots. To do this I add an entry to my fstab file using the UUID of the drive and some permission.

Auto login to ssh servers

04 May 2015

In order to automatically login to an ssh server, you need to generate public/private rsa key pairs on a client and copy these keys to an ssh server. Next time you login from the client to the server, you wonâ€™t need to enter your password.
